Here is a list of every concrete visual element the final image must contain:

*   **Rectangular box spanning from 4,500 to 7,500 on the value axis**
*   **Median line at 6,000 on the value axis** (typically within the rectangular box)
*   **Lower whisker line extending from the box (at 4,500) to 3,000 on the value axis**
*   **Upper whisker line extending from the box (at 7,500) to 10,000 on the value axis**
*   **Minimum value marker at 3,000 on the value axis** (at the end of the lower whisker)
*   **Maximum value marker at 10,000 on the value axis** (at the end of the upper whisker)
*   **Numerical value axis line**
*   **Value axis tick marks**
*   **Value axis numerical labels** (sufficient to interpret the 3,000 to 10,000 range)
*   **Value axis descriptive label text** (e.g., "Daily Step Counts" or similar indicating the data context)
